name: Peacekeeper (FidelGastro)
description:
You are the Peacekeeper, the guardian watching over the altars of the gods. But one day, a group of pillagers has come to profane this sacred place and it is your duty to protect the altars. Trust me... you don't want the gods to feel humiliated...

Controls :

D : Go right

Q : Go left

Spacebar : Jump

Left Click : Attack

Right Click : Throw the sword in front of you

Z : Throw the sword up

S : Throw the sword down

Middle mouse click : Teleport to your sword

Suppr : Reset your save

More informations : 

This project is the very first video game I made ! I made all the elements by myself except the music and the sprite of the main character which is a remade version of the default Rogue skin from the mobile game Soul Knight. However, I want to thank Ema OUARDI, Yanis ROJANO and Maxime CORBY for their help on some problems during the coding.
